Text: Dammit - I've spent three hours trying to figure out how to upload the file and I've still screwed it up.  Can anyone tell me how to delete this torrent so I can try to do it again?
The whole thing sounds pretty lame, so maybe you should just drop it and go enjoy your fantastic new lifestyle.

Thanks for the advice.  I was going to spend the evening writing comments on the internet that make me sound like a whiny little bitch who can't get a girlfriend, but I will go and do something more fun instead.
